title: Spindle, 1100–1400
medium: Medium: wood shaft, ceramic whorl, paint
description: Spindle with slender wooden shaft tapered to ends. One end broken. Black pottery oval whorl in center, incised and painted with red, white and yellow in design of minute conventionalized faces. Traces of black, red and white rings painted on center of shaft.

tombstone.epitaph: Spindle, 1100–1400.Medium: wood shaft, ceramic whorl, paint. 1920-1-4.
